replies.bodyText:
This doesn't need to happen in the publish queue. Node will be removed immediately when remove() called, but publish notification is run async in the publish queue.
It's the similar approach in Topic.withNewerValue(), where newer value is set immediately, while fire notification is run async in the publish queue.
